Description:

If you desperately need to steal something - you've come to the right place. In a city full of dangers, there is only one person who is able to perform the most complex order. In comparison, the cruel Baron Nortkrest pale and his greedy guardian, the mysterious Queen beggars ardent revolutionaries and street dwellers "bottom". His name is Garrett, and he has mastered the art of breaking and entering. Plague, war, fighting ... let the rest tremble - and he will steal! 
Imperishable classic returns. A brand new game from the studio Eidos-Montreal, given the fans an excellent Deus Ex: Human Revolution, revives the best traditions of the legendary series Thief. Can you become Master thief and survive on the dark streets of the city, where the blood on the streets - as common as gold coins in chests almighty Baron? 

Features: 

Way of the Master-thief: the unthinkable robbery, stuffing their pockets with the same risk to life
Choose your approach: sneak in the shadows, or use countless tricks reserves the corpses of those who fell under the arm
Incredible dive: Explore gloomy town in search of answers to the mysterious events of the past
Gripping story: diabolical intrigue and confrontation, threatening to destroy the whole world

Features of Release:

- Release is based on the Thief - Master Thief Edition *
Cut: voice except Russian and English
Recoded: nothing
Independent choice of language and voice text
Game Version: 1.3.4118.5 (Update 4)
Installation time: ~ 14 minutes

Additional content: 
The Bank Heist + 
+ The Moira Asylum (The Forsaken) - Challenge Map 
Pack + Booster - Opportunist 
+ Booster Pack - Predator 
+ Booster Pack - Ghost

Digital bonuses Bonus folder in a folder with the distribution. 

Extra Information:

Distribution updated 3/19/14 1:47
- Integrated patch to version 1.3.4118.5 (Update 4)
list of fixes
- Added AMD Mantle support.
- Added AMD TrueAudio support. TrueAudio hardware support can be enabled in the in-game audio options menu.
- For more information about AMD Mantle and AMD TrueAudio technology, please see: <a href="
http://community.amd.com/community/amd-blogs/amd-ga...driver-for-thief" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://community.amd.com/community/amd-blogs/amd-ga...driver-for-thief</a>
AMD Catalyst 14.3 Beta driver is required to use AMD Mantle and AMD TrueAudio.
- Image Based Reflections are now optional in 64 -bit version. Used to always be enabled in 64 -bit and never in 32 -bit.
- Added "Automatically Limit Texture Quality" option, when turned on it limits texture quality based on the amount of dedicated VRAM.
- Fixed medallion icons not or incorrectly lighting up on some setups.
- Fixed subtitles not showing during cinematics when using the 32 -bit version.
- Fixed an issue where on specific setups, the game would crash during startup, and creating a new windows account would fix it.
- Fixed an issue where sometimes the mouse position would be offset when running with Surround or Eyefinity.
- Various crash fixes.
- Various optimizations.

***If the distribution to update downloads - rename the folder in Thief.2014.Multi-RU.Repack.by.z10yded
To update an old hand Download torrent file again and as the folder to upload , specify the directory with existing files.
